title: Large-Scale Short-Term Intensive Education Program for Strengthening Core Competencies in Surgical Nursing

context.prior_knowledge: Basic nursing theory and clinical practice experience
context.additional_context: Practice-oriented education using VR simulations in smartphone-based limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Perform core technical skills required for surgical patient care (e.g., wound management, drain care) with 80% or higher accuracy.
Explain four or more preventive measures and response protocols for postoperative complications (e.g., infection, bleeding).
Apply decision-making processes in emergency scenarios via VR simulation with a 70% or higher success rate.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
